verses.name: 1 Kings 6:24
verses.text: And five cubits was the one wing of the cherub, and five cubits the other wing of the cherub: from the uttermost part of the one wing unto the uttermost part of the other were ten cubits.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:25
verses.text: And the other cherub was ten cubits: both the cherubims were of one measure and one size.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:26
verses.text: The height of the one cherub was ten cubits, and so was it of the other cherub.
